mapper.select: SELECT C.CON_ID , AT.CON_ID , AT.SEQ , AT.ALT_DIV , DL.DL_CD_NM AS ALT_DIV_CD , AT.ALT_CON_DATE , AT.CON_ST_DATE , AT.CON_ED_DATE , AT.SUPP_AMT , AT.VAT_AMT , AT.REMARK , AT.CONFIRM_YN , AT.CON_NO , CU.CUST_NM FROM BM_CON_INFO C LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CON_ALT AT ON C.CON_ID = AT.CON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CUST_INFO CU ON C.CUST_ID = CU.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL ON AT.ALT_DIV = DL.DL_CD AND DL.CO_CD = 'ALT_DIV' WHERE C.CON_ID = #{value} ORDER BY CON_ED_DATE DESC
SELECT CON_ID , SEQ , ALT_DIV , CON_NM , ALT_CON_DATE , CON_ST_DATE , CON_ED_DATE , SUPP_AMT , VAT_AMT , REMARK , CONFIRM_YN , CON_NO FROM BM_CON_ALT WHERE SEQ = #{value}
